description:
The investment seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, of 125% of the daily performance of the FTSE Developed All Cap ex US Index.
 The fund, under normal circumstances, invests at least 80% of its net assets (plus borrowing for investment purposes) in equities in the index, exchange-traded funds ("ETFs") that track the index and other financial instruments that provide daily leveraged exposure to the index. The index is a market-capitalization weighted index representing the performance of large-, mid- and small-capitalization companies in developed markets, excluding the USA. The fund is non-diversified.
